mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.record_id AS "record.id", a.book_id AS "bookId", a.book_id AS "book.id", c.category AS "book.category", c.code AS "book.code", a.amount AS "amount", a.balance AS "balance", a.direction AS "direction", a.bookrecord_type AS "bookRecordType", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", c.name AS "bookName"
LEFT JOIN accountant_book_record b ON b.id = a.record_id LEFT JOIN accountant_book c ON c.id = a.book_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accountant_book_record_detail( record_id, book_id, amount, bookrecord_type, balance, direction, record_timestamp, remarks, create_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{record.id}, #{book.id}, #{amount}, #{bookRecordType}, #{balance}, #{direction}, #{recordTimestamp}, #{remarks}, #{createDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE accountant_book_record_detail SET record_id = #{record.id}, book_id = #{book.id}, amount = #{amount}, balance = #{balance}, direction = #{direction}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
